SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.textures

Class TuiTextureManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.tui.textures.TuiTextureManager
public class TuiTextureManager extends Object
This class handles loading textures from disk for the TUI version of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • TuiTextureManager

      private TuiTextureManager()
      Private constructor to initialize the texture manager. Loads all the textures from the disk and stores them in maps.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static TuiTextureManager getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the TuiTextureManager.
      Returns:
      the singleton instance

    • loadTexture

      private TuiTexture loadTexture(int id) throws IOException
      Loads a texture with the specified ID from the disk.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the texture to load
      Returns:
      the loaded TuiTexture
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while loading the texture

    • readTexture

      private ColoredChar[][] readTexture(BufferedReader reader) throws IOException
      Reads a texture from a BufferedReader.
      Parameters:
      reader - the BufferedReader to read from
      Returns:
      a 2D array of ColoredChar representing the texture
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading the texture

    • getTexture

      public ColoredChar[][] getTexture(int id, boolean flipped)
      Retrieves the texture with the specified ID, optionally flipped.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the texture to retrieve
      flipped - whether to retrieve the flipped version of the texture
      Returns:
      a 2D array of ColoredChar representing the texture

    • getBackTexture

      public ColoredChar[][] getBackTexture(BackTexture backTexture)
      Retrieves the background texture for the specified BackTexture.
      Parameters:
      backTexture - the BackTexture to retrieve
      Returns:
      a 2D array of ColoredChar representing the background texture
